title: Lynda - After Effects Breakdowns - N-Trig Commercial
description:
Lynda - After Effects Breakdowns - N-Trig Commercial

FYI : This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 11m Intermediate Mar 09, 2016  | Uploaded in Apr 25, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: Video 
Software: After Effects Particular Form Plexus 
Author: Eran Stern 

Get a glimpse behind the scenes of a real-world commercial made with After Effects. This course is for artists who are familiar with After Effects and want to better understand advanced techniques, design concepts, and approaches to complex projects.â€¨â€¨The featured product is the N-trig pen, a digital pen that "draws the line from idea to technology." You will reverse engineer the finished project to understand the practical steps and creative decisions the filmmakers made along the way.â€¨â€¨Eran Stern shows how to decode a client brief, present design concepts for signoff, create previsualizations and animatics, and then transition the design to After Effects. Many of the effects, such as dust layers, streaks of light, and geometric lines, are achieved using some of Eran's favorite third-party plugins (Particular, Form, and Plexus). The lessons are full of practical examples for broadcast television as well as online distribution. Along the way, Eran weaves in tips, shortcuts, and professional techniques that will amaze both veteran After Effects users and new motion graphics artists.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Analyzing a client brief
	â€¢	Presenting to a client
	â€¢	Creating animatics
	â€¢	Integrating 3D renders with After Effects
	â€¢	Animating lines and particle effects
	â€¢	Creating an animated paper-to-digital transition
	â€¢	Modeling a digital pen with third-party plugins
